title: OKS-BNB syrup pool, Stake CAKE to earn OKS!
body:
The Syrup Pool:
Total Tokens: 1,143,000 OKS
Distribution duration: 60 days
Start block: 7,018,114 (approx. 3pm UTC on April 30th)
Finish block: 8,735,400 (approx. 3pm UTC on June 29th)
Token rewards per block: 0.66145 OKS

The Farm:
In order to host the OKS Syrup Pool, we will need to provide a OKS-BNB farm that will have 2x CAKE rewards for the first 48 hours and then 1x CAKE rewards after that.

The Vote:
As usual, it needs to be approved via a vote.

Why do we need a vote? Since it dilutes rewards, the chefs want BSC’s greatest community to make the decision themselves.
author: 0xb829eD10f8F363EaF5D72244d6eA07a2f9d741Ff
